body:
Dear friends,



I really appreciate if someone helps me through my simulation problems.

I have a simple integrated daylight and energy simulation and I get an error when  I connect my shading as a context. also, an error related to the name of lighting schedule.

how can I deal with these problems?



best regards

Farzane
topic: problem with integrated daylight and energy simulation

replies.body: Can you copy the error message here? Is it a warning or an error?
